DOC.brief_summary: 35 patients with multiple sclerosis have been enrolled in a previous study to record and analyze gait parameters. This study aims to enroll gender and and matched healthy subjects for a control group, to compare patients' gait parameters with healthy subjects'.
DOC.brief_title: Electrophysiological Study of Spatiotemporal Gait Parameters in Patients in Early Stage of Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: subjects without any gait trouble age â‰¥ 18 and < 55 years old gender and age (+/ 5 years) matched pathology with potential gait impairment pregnant or breast feeding patient patient under legal protection no health insurance coverage absence of written informed consent
